content.body: Domenic: I haven't done measurements; that's a good point. I wasn't thinking of <link> tags; I guess that's enabled by using the new HTML imports part of the web components spec (as opposed to just registering the component via JS)
timwis: no, just inserting the same link tag in the component, e.g. when using shadow DOM
I hear some browsers even cache <style> tags if their textContent is identical
